meanings: (물건·일 등을) handling, handle, deal with, (판매하다) carry, trade in, deal in

vlive.korean: 너 때문에 나 학교에서 걸레 취급당했던 거 몰라? Because of you! They treated me like a slut in school. Don't you know that? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 적어도 난 진짜 연애중이야 #남사친이_불편해졌다 #삼각관계 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP5
vlive.english: Because of you! They treated me like a slut in school. Don't you know that?

vlive.korean: 말 걸었다가 치한 취급을 받는 게 아닐까? If I talked to her, will I be seen as a pervert? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 모쏠남과의 술 한잔! 김준현이 알려주는 초특급 연애 팁은? <김준현의짠> 3회
vlive.english: If I talked to her, will I be seen as a pervert?

vlive.korean: 아 뭐야? 애 취급하지 마~ Hey! What the. Don't treat me like a baby! 듣기 View video LICO TV : [연애하루전 ZERO] EP.16 더 높이, 더 멀리_OST/JB(GOT7)
vlive.english: Hey! What the. Don't treat me like a baby!

vlive.korean: 안 내면 진 거 가위바위보! - 저는 뭐 인간 취급도 안 합니까? Rock scissors paper. - Am I invisible? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.60
vlive.english: Rock scissors paper. - Am I invisible?

vlive.korean: [우리 뷔도 가위 냈는데...] 저는 뭐 인간 취급도 안 합니까? [V also put out scissors] Am I invisible? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.60
vlive.english: [V also put out scissors] Am I invisible?
